input_options.title: Input options
input_options.description: Define where the pipeline should find input data

input.description: Input data source: local directory, archive file, or remote URL
input.help: Can be: (1) Path to a local directory containing proteome/ subfolder and species_tree.nwk file, (2) Path to a local archive file (.tar.gz, .tgz, .zip), or (3) HTTP/HTTPS URL to download an archive. Archives will be automatically extracted and cached.

proteome_folder.description: Path to input directory containing the proteome files in fasta format
proteome_folder.help: Override the default proteome folder location. Only used when input is a local directory. If not specified, defaults to input/proteome/.

hogmap_in.description: Path to input directory containing the hogmap files
hogmap_in.help: If provided, the hogmap files will be used instead of computing them from scratch with OMAmer. This can save time if you have already computed the hogmaps for your proteomes.

species_tree.description: Path to species tree file in Newick format
species_tree.help: Override the default species tree location. Only used when input is a local directory. If not specified, defaults to input/species_tree.nwk.

splice_folder.description: Path to input directory containing the splice files
splice_folder.help: If provided, FastOMA will use splice variant information to select representative isoforms for each gene. Only used when input is a local directory.

omamer_db.description: Path to OMAmer database against which the proteomes will be mapped
omamer_db.help: If not provided, the default OMAmer database (LUCA) will be used.

test_data_cache.description: Path where (remote) input archives will be stored and permanently cached

input_folder.help_text: This parameter has been renamed to --input. Please update your command line or configuration files.

output_options.title: Output options
output_options.description: Define where the pipeline should store the output data

output_folder.description: The output directory where the results will be saved

hogmap_folder.description: The output directory where the omamer hogmap files will be saved
hogmap_folder.help: If not provided, the hogmap files will be saved in the output_folder/hogmap directory.

filter_gap_ratio_row.description: Gap ratio threshold for row filtering

force_pairwise_ortholog_generation.description: Force generation of pairwise orthologs even for large datasets (may be slow)
force_pairwise_ortholog_generation.help: By default, pairwise orthologs are not generated for datasets with more than 25 species to avoid long runtimes. Enable this option to override this behavior.

generic_options.title: Generic options
generic_options.description: Less common options for the pipeline

trace_report_suffix.description: Suffix to add to the trace report filename. Default is the date and time in the format yyyy-MM-dd_HH-mm-ss.
